category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_classify_immediately_NX
preference.preference_description: Specifies if new Items or ItemRevisions are classified when they are saved from NXManager Unigraphics. Valid values are 0/1. If a value 1 is specified and NXManager Unigraphics is started from Teamcenter Rich Client and save a newly created part in Unigraphics, the user will be asked in Rich Client to classify the new item / item revision. 0 - Do not classify from Unigraphics (default value). 1 - Classify from Unigraphics.
